name: Rare Gheegur
description: The Zuffle doesn't fall far from the tree, and the Rare Gheegur's aesthetic certainly calls to mind the image of a kooky scientist bringing its creations to life. An unexpected side-effect of this Monster's evolution was the disappearance of its trademark glow that elicited apprehension in its fellow Wublins - which makes it even easier to lurk among the shadows.
polairty: Negative from: Rare Dermit, Negative toward: Rare Creepuscule, Positive from: Rare Tympa, Positive toward: Rare Zynth
